blogPost.excerpt: On Deck is awesome, but it costs both time and money. Browse Fellows from across cohorts, and book a 1:1 with them for free. They'll help you figure out if the program is a fit for you and your lifestyle.
blogPost.body: On Deck is awesome, but it costs both time and money. Browse Fellows from across cohorts, and book a 1:1 with them for free. They'll help you figure out if the program is a fit for you and your lifestyle.
blogPost.title: HelloFellow - Free chats with On Deck fellows
blogPost.author: Chez Spigelman

localize.description: 在甲板上很厉害，但是既要花时间又要花钱。浏览来自各队列的研究员，并与他们免费预约1:1。他们会帮助你找出这个项目是否适合你和你的生活方式。
在甲板上很厲害，但是既要花時間又要花錢。瀏覽來自各隊列的研究員，並與他們免費預約1:1。他們會幫助你找出這個項目是否適合你和你的生活方式。

previous.excerpt: Neuro gives you access to a network of GPUs with a single API call. Get instant MLOps. ☁️ Serverless compute ⚖️ Only pay for the compute used = no more 24/7 hosting fees! ⚡️ Go from prototype to production +10x faster. Check it out at https://www.getneuro.ai/
previous.title: Neuro - Instant infrastructure for machine learning

localize.description: Neuro让您只需调用一个API就能访问GPU网络。获得即时的MLOps。⚖️ 无服务器计算 ⚖️ 只需为所使用的计算付费=不再需要24/7的托管费! ⚡️从原型到生产+10倍的速度。查看https://www.getneuro.ai/
localize.tagline: 机器学习的即时基础设施
